pr_title: RDM-10013: added LOG_CALLBACK_DETAILS to support call back logging

timeline.message: added LOG_CALLBACK_DETAILS to support call back logging
added fixed junits for call back logging

Update Jenkinsfile_CNP

changed es flag to false - temporarily
added junits for call back logging

timeline.bodyText: this should be a private static final, all upper case. I'd also remove the comment
timeline.author: mario-paniccia

timeline.bodyText:
I would log also the url to make it simpler to correlate the response to the callback. Otherwise it can be difficult when plenty of callbacks happen at the same time
Also remove initial space please
timeline.author: mario-paniccia

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            LOG.info("Invoking callback {} of CallbackType {} at {} with Request {}",
          
          
            
                            LOG.info("Invoking callback {} of type {} with request: {}",
          
      
    
    
  

we could avoid logging the start time since it's logged by default by the logging framework?
timeline.author: mario-paniccia

timeline.bodyText:
we could do an extract method here to simplify the code.
All this could go into a private method
boolean logCallbackDetails(....)
and then it can be directly called on line 143 and 148: e.g.
if(logCallbackDetails(...) {
     ....
